Uses of Annotation Interface
com.github.hanyaeger.core.annotations.OnActivation

Packages that use OnActivation
Package
Description
com.github.hanyaeger.api
Classes and packages that are part of the public API of Yaeger.
com.github.hanyaeger.api.scenes
All classes, interfaces and enumerations that are related to scenes.
com.github.hanyaeger.api.userinput
All interfaces that enable an instance of YaegerEntity, YaegerScene or both to receive user input.

  • Uses of OnActivation in com.github.hanyaeger.api

    Modifier and Type
    Method
    Description
    default void
    TimerContainer.initTimers()
    Annotated with OnActivation, this method will be called during activation.

    Method
    Description
    default void
    TileMapContainer.initTileMaps()
    Initialize all instances of TileMap that were added to this TileMapContainer.
